original: <<Warmup -- 60 seconds>>
<<Map made by Pasas1345>>
<<Inspired by the game: Princess Connect Re:Dive!>>
zh_trans: <<灵感源自游戏：公主连结 Re:Dive！>>

original: <<Let's get familiar with the abilities of the weapons>>
zh_trans: <<让我们熟悉一下武器的能力>>

original: <<Warmup -- 50 seconds>>
<<Kokkoro's Spear - Heals 50 HP. After that it pushes zombies away with the faeries it spawns>>
zh_trans: <<可可萝的长枪 - 恢复50点HP.随后召唤精灵将僵尸击退。>>

original: <<Kokkoro's Spear - After casting a healing aura will appear for 8 seconds.>>
zh_trans: <<可可萝的长枪 - 施展后，展开持续8秒的治愈光环。>>

original: <<Warmup -- 40 seconds>>
<<Pecorine's Sword - Become a shield which blocks zombies from going through you.>>
zh_trans: <<佩可莉姆的剑 - 化身为团队的盾牌，阻挡僵尸通过自身所在位置。>>

original: <<Pecorine's Sword has been picked up>>
<<Kyaru's Grimore has been picked up>>
<<Kokkoro's Spear has been picked up>>
<<Pecorine's Sword - After which the sword swings 3 times freezing and pushing back the zombies.>>
zh_trans: <<佩可莉姆的剑 - 发动三次斩击，冻结并击退僵尸.>>

original: <<Warmup -- 30 seconds>>
<<Kyaru's Grimore - Charge magic which then shoots an orb that damages and slows zombies.>>
zh_trans: <<凯露的魔导书 - 凝聚魔力后发射魔法球，对僵尸造成伤害并附加减速.>>

original: <<Warmup -- 20 seconds>>
<<Hopefully you'll be able to adventure with everyone.>>
zh_trans: <<希望能与大家共赴冒险之旅。>>

original: <<Warmup -- 10 seconds>>
<<Warmup -- Ending>>
<<Stage 1 - Forest & Landosol>>
** The trees are in the way! We'll be able to clear it in 20 seconds. **
zh_trans: ** 树木碍事！ 20 秒后清除障碍。**

original: ** Just 10 more seconds! **
** 5 seconds left. Just one last log. **
zh_trans: ** 剩余 5 秒！就差一点了。**

original: ** Its clear! **
<<当前版本号码为000>>
<<BUG反馈请前往Dc频道>>
<<discord.gg/eXR7xumCfP>>
** More trees on the way! Hold on for a bit. It will take around 20 seconds again. **
zh_trans: ** 前方发现新障碍！请稍候，预计需 20 秒清理。**

original: ** 5 more seconds! **
** Now... We may need our weapons. Could you find them in the forest? **
zh_trans: ** 现在...可能需要武器。能否在森林中寻获？**

original: ** There should be three paths. I think all paths has a weapon of ours. Thanks in advance. **
zh_trans: **有三条路。我觉得所有路上都有我们的武器，提前感谢。**

original: ** Kyaru: These rocks are in the way! I think I should have enough magic to blow these up. Hold on for 20 seconds. **
zh_trans: ** 凯露：这些岩石真碍事！魔力储备充足，20 秒后实施爆破。 **

original: ** Kokkoro: I see my spear right there. Unfortunately it's blocked by a tree. I can summon spirits to carry them. **
zh_trans: ** 可可萝：发现长枪位置，但被树木阻碍。正在召唤精灵搬运。**

original: ** Kokkoro: This will take 15 seconds. **
zh_trans: ** 可可萝：预计需要 15 秒。**

original: ** Pecorine: Seems like the rock wall is blocking the path. I guess I can punch through it. **
zh_trans: ** 佩可莉姆：岩壁封路呢~就用这双拳头开个洞吧！**

original: ** Pecorine: Give me 20 seconds to warm up and charge the punch. **
zh_trans: ** 佩可莉姆：需要 20 秒做热身运动和蓄力重拳哟~ **

original: ** Kyaru: 5 more... Charging! **
zh_trans: ** 凯露：最后 5 秒...魔力充填！**

original: ** Kokkoro: The way is clear now. We can go on right ahead. **
zh_trans: ** 可可萝：道路畅通，请继续前进。 **

original: ** We have found Kokkoro's Staff! **
** Kyaru: The way is clear! **
** We have found Kyaru's Grimore! **
** Pecorine: Here we go! **
** We have found Pecorine's Sword! **
** You found all of our weapons! We can push forward. Let's just wait for 20 seconds for the rest to catch up. **
zh_trans: ** 你找齐了我们的武器！这下可以继续推进了。先等 20 秒让后面的人跟上吧。**

original: ** You know what. Keep the weapons for now. We will teach you how to use them in Landosol. **
zh_trans: ** 对了，这些武器暂时由你保管。回到兰德索尔后我们会教你使用方法。**

original: ** Hold on to it until then. **
** 5 seconds. Ready to go? **
zh_trans: ** 倒数 5 秒。准备好了吗？**

original: ** Let us push forward! **
** Wait why is there a golem? **
zh_trans: ** 等等...为什么会出现石巨人？**

original: ** Everyone get over here! Its about to throw a boulder! **
zh_trans: ** 全员集合！它要发起攻击了！**

original: <<Golem>>
** You know what. We will teach you how to use our weapons. **
zh_trans: ** 计划变更！现在就传授你武器的使用方法。**

original: ** Just focus on it and channel your strength through it. It should listen. **
zh_trans: ** 集中精神，将力量灌注其中，武器就会回应你的意志。**

original: ** And you will be able to cast it's abilities. **
zh_trans: ** 届时便能解放封印在武器中的技能。**

original: <<Items have been unlocked!>>
zh_trans: <<武器机能解放！现在你可以使用它们了>>

original: ** From the looks of it the Golem is weak against magic. **
zh_trans: ** 看这魔素流动...石巨人的魔法抗性很弱。**

original: <Kyaru>: I guess my weapon specializes against him!
zh_trans: <凯露>：看来我的武器正好克制它呢！（魔导书能对BOSS造成伤害）

original: ** The Golem's Dead! Nice one everyone. **
zh_trans: ** 石巨人击破！各位干得漂亮！**

original: ** Let us go now to Landosol. It's close. **
zh_trans: ** 兰德索尔近在咫尺，全速前进！**

original: <<The boulders are now gone>>
** Okay. They will close the gates! Everyone get in within 30 seconds. **
zh_trans: ** 注意！城门即将关闭！ 30 秒内全员入城！**

original: ** 15 seconds left! **
** 5 seconds left! **
** The gates are closing! Get inside before it's too late! **
zh_trans: ** 城门正在关闭！快抓住最后时机进来！**

original: <<You and your guildmates move inside Landosol>>
** We got one of the keys to unlock the restaurant! **
zh_trans: ** 我们拿到了解锁餐厅的钥匙之一！**

original: ** Door will open in 30 seconds. **
<<The door can be unlocked>>
** The door is now open. **
** I guess we can close the door here. Lets wait for 30 seconds for the others. **
zh_trans: ** 在这里等待 30 秒，确保所有人员到齐。**

original: <<Yuuki's Sword has been picked up!>>
** 5 seconds left! Everyone inside! **
** Let us rest here for now... **
** 2 hours later... **
** Why is it very quiet outside? **
zh_trans: ** 外面安静得...未免太异常了？**

original: ** Lets go out through the back door... **
** Wait... SHADOWS! RUN! **
<<Get too close and you will die.>>
** There is still monsters inside! Get rid of them! **
zh_trans: ** 还有魔物残留！除掉它们！**

original: ** We have to defeat it here at the bridge. **
<<Shadows>>
** It's gone! **
** The bridge is unstable! Get out of there! **
<<当前版本号码为002>>
<<当前版本号码为003>>
<<Stage 1 Completed!>>
<<Stage 2 - The False Princess>>
** Crates are blocking the way! Hold 20 seconds. **
zh_trans: ** 木箱挡住了去路！坚守 20 秒。**

original: ** 5 seconds left. **
** Its broken. Let us proceed. **
** We gotta break these planks! Give us 30 seconds! **
zh_trans: ** 这些木板必须破坏！需要 30 秒！**

original: ** 15 more seconds! **
** It is broken! Let's keep going. **
** Wait. There is no way out! **
** We are also surrounded! We have to hold on! **
zh_trans: ** 我们被包围了！必须死守防线！**

original: ** There are too many! Is this going to be the end? **
zh_trans: ** 数量太多了！难道要到此为止了吗？**

original: <???>: Seems like you need some help over there.
<???>: Im opening a portal over there. Hold on a little bit longer!
zh_trans: <???>: 正在开启传送门，再坚持一下！

original: <???>: It's open! Get out of there!
** That was way too close. **
** Let us rest for 10 seconds. There were way too many monsters inside. **
zh_trans: ** 原地休整 10 秒。刚才的魔物潮太密集了。**

original: <Pecorine>: Wait. Where is Kyaru?
<Pecorine>: We got to find her!
<Pecorine>: Enough resting! We have got to find her!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 没时间休息了！快去找人！

original: ** The door is stuck. Hold on for 30 seconds. **
** 15 more seconds. **
** 5 more seconds. Get ready to push forward. **
** It's open! Let's move forward! **
** Door will unlock in 20 seconds. **
** 10 seconds left. **
** Let us wait for the others. We will close the door in 25 seconds. **
zh_trans: ** 等待队友， 25 秒后关门。 **

original: ** The door is closing in 20 seconds. **
** The door is closing in 10 seconds. **
** 5 more seconds. **
** The door is closing! **
<Pecorine>: Wait. It's Kyaru over there at the cage!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 看！凯露被关在牢笼里了！

original: <Pecorine>: Damn it. We can't just go over there. We have to go a different route.
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 可恶...这样根本过不去啊！

original: <Pecorine>: But all of the ways over there are blocked!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 可是所有路都被封死了！

original: <???>: I think I can help with that. But I think this is the last of the portals I can make.
zh_trans: <???>: 我或许能帮忙，但这是最后一次开启传送门了。

original: <Pecorine>: Wait the doors being forced open by monsters!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 魔物在强行突破大门！

original: <Pecorine>: Whoever is helping us we need the portal open!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 不管是谁在帮忙，快开传送门！（贴着窗户才能传送）

original: <???>: It's open!
<Kokkoro>: They have managed to follow us over the portal! Keep them from advancing!
zh_trans: <可可萝>: 魔物跟过来了！阻止它们前进！

original: ** The door will open in 25 seconds! **
** 15 more seconds! Keep them at bay for a little longer! **
** It's open! Lets keep going towards her! **
zh_trans: ** 门开了！继续向凯露所在的方向前进！ **

original: ** 10 more seconds! **
** It's open! It's a straight path to Kyaru! **
zh_trans: ** 道路畅通！能直接到凯露那边了！ **

original: <Pecorine>: I'm breaking her out! Give me 30 seconds!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 我来破坏牢笼！需要 30 秒！

original: ** 20 more seconds. **
** 10 more seconds. **
<???>: Seems like you have fallen for my trap.
<???>: You really do care about Kyaru you guys do you...
zh_trans: <???>: 这么在意凯露...真是感人的羁绊啊。

original: <???>: She really does like being in your little guild.
zh_trans: <???>: 她似乎很享受在你们公会的生活？

original: <Pecorine>: Kaiser Insight... The one that stole my title.
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 覇瞳皇帝...篡夺我称号之人。

original: <Kaiser>: Ah. The Princess that has been forgotten by all.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 呵...被所有人遗忘的公主殿下。

original: <Kaiser>: How was the experience? Was it painful?
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 失去一切的滋味如何？很痛苦吧？

original: <Kaiser>: No matter. It is time for you and your guildmates to perish.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 不过无所谓了，你们都将死在这里。

original: <Kaiser>: Don't worry about Kyaru. She will be watching you all die.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 不必担心凯露，她会亲眼看着你们死去。

original: <Kaiser>: This is her punishment after all for not following me.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 这就是违抗我的惩罚。

original: <Kaiser>: Time to die.
** SURVIVE **
<Pecorine>: We can't give up now! We have to survive!
zh_trans: <佩可莉姆>: 现在放弃还太早了！活下去！

original: <Kokkoro>: We got seperated! We have to find each other!
zh_trans: <可可萝>: 我们被冲散了！要尽快汇合！

original: <Kyaru>: Hey. I think I can help from here. Although you have to survive for 50 seconds.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 听得到吗？我这边能提供支援...但你们要撑过 50 秒。

original: <Pecorine>: Kyaru! Where are you?
<Kyaru>: Just survive. I'm in Kaiser's space and with my connection I can open a path.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 专心防守！我在霸瞳的领域里，正在构筑通道。

original: <Kyaru>: I'm still gathering the power to open it.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 等我积蓄够力量就能打开通路。

original: <Kyaru>: After I open the path. It's up to the new guildmembers. I have chosen a new path with you guys.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 通道开启后...就交给大家吧...我已选择与你们同行。

original: <Kyaru>: Defeat Kaiser. For me. For Pecorine.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 击败霸瞳...为了我，也为了佩可。

original: <Kyaru>: 30 more seconds.
<Kyaru>: 20 more seconds.
<Kyaru>: 10 more seconds.
<Kyaru>: 5.
<Kyaru>: 4.
<Kyaru>: 3.
<Kyaru>: 2.
<Kyaru>: 1.
<Kyaru>: It's open. The path to Kaiser has been open. Defeat Kaiser. So that I am free.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 道路已打开，击溃霸瞳我就自由了。

original: <Kaiser>: Seems like you made it with the help of Kyaru.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 居然借助凯露的力量来到这里。

original: <Kaiser>: After I'm done with you all. She will get a very hefty punishment.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 解决你们之后...我会好好“奖励”她的背叛。

original: <Kaiser>: Now.
<<Mana Senri - The Omniscient Kaiser>>
<<You have 75 seconds to weaken Kaiser before they casts their Union Burst and kill everyone!>>
zh_trans: <<在 75 秒内削弱霸瞳，阻止她释放连结爆发，否则她会杀掉所有人！>>

original: <Kaiser>: Time to get a little bit more serious...
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 是时候认真一点了...

original: <Kaiser>: Rise monsters! Kill these filth.
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 苏醒吧眷属们！碾碎这些蝼蚁！（守尸笼）

original: <Kyaru>: Kaiser is weak enough.
<Kyaru>: I'm charging an attack. Survive until I can release this attack.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 正在蓄力攻击，坚持到我释放的那一刻。

original: <Kyaru>: Take that!
<Kokkoro>: I will start sealing her right away!
zh_trans: <可可萝>: 立即展开封印术式！

original: <Kyaru>: Wait something isn't right yet.
zh_trans: <凯露>: 等等...能量流动不对劲！

original: <Kaiser>: Help me monsters! Kill THEM!
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 眷属们！给我撕碎他们！（守尸笼）

original: <Kyaru>: It's not yet over! Hold them back!
zh_trans: <凯露>: 还没结束！挡住它们！

original: <Kokkoro>: 35 more seconds till Kaiser is sealed!
<Kokkoro>: 25 more seconds till Kaiser is sealed!
<Kaiser>: You monsters are useless! DIE DIE!
zh_trans: <霸瞳>: 没用的废物！都去死吧！（BOSS方向来高低伤害刀，注意回复血量）

original: <Kokkoro>: 15 more seconds till Kaiser is sealed!
<Kokkoro>: 5 more seconds till Kaiser is sealed!
<Kaiser>: NOOOOOOOOOOO!
<<Stage 2 Won!>>
<<Legend of Astrum>>
<<By Pasas1345>>
<<Inspired by the game Prinecss Connect Re:Dive!>>
zh_trans: <<灵感源自游戏：公主连结 Re:Dive！>>

original: <Ameth>: Initializing Re:Dive Mode. This is your final challenge...
zh_trans: <爱梅斯>: 正在启动Re:Dive(连关)模式...这是最后的试炼...
